description: Make a meal out of your Greek salad with lean lamb steaks cooked to perfection.
name: Lamb Greek Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large red onion, peeled and finely sliced
60g kalamata olives, drained, pitted and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, mix the olive oil, lemon juice and zest, oregano and garlic. Place the lamb steaks in a shallow dish, pour over half the lemon and oil mix and marinate for 30 minutes.
Place the sliced red onion in the remaining lemon and oil mix and leave to steep until serving.

Heat a large griddle or frying pan on a medium high heat. Discard the marinade and add the lamb steaks to the pan. Cook for 3 minutes on each side for medium. Remove from the pan, wrap in foil and rest for 3 minutes.
Tip the onions and dressing into a large bowl and add the chopped tomatoes, cucumber, olives, mint and crumbled feta and cracked black pepper and mix well.
Divide the salad between 4 plates, thinly slice the lamb steaks, place on top and serve.
